description: Advance payments for 3 or 12 months of prescriptions.
title: Prescriptions: prepayment certificates issued
description-extra: NHS prescriptions are issued to patients with prepayment certificates free of charge at the point of dispensing.
costs:
The administration of prepayment certificates, medical exemption certificates (MEDEX) and maternity exemption (MATEX) certificates is a single process, and the cost of administering each service has therefore been apportioned based on application volumes.
Average cost per transaction includes:
- postage - estimate of cost incurred for use of a postal service; this figure does not include the cost of stationery
- staff -estimated cost of salaries, pensions and National Insurance contributions for staff directly involved in the process
- overheads - includes all related administrative expenditure including management, information technology maintenance and estates; capital expenditure, including IT development costs and depreciation, are excluded.
- printing and distribution - includes internal printing costs, cost of stationery, cards, card personalisation, printing of carrier letters, and sorting of mail.
other-notes: The number of transactions includes all transactions processed including those where the customer has received a refund at a later date due to a change in their circumstances.
